website_summaries.verdict: An outstanding gaming laptop that comes at a reasonable price.
pros: Uses a 9th generation Intel processor, which delivers impressive speeds
Easy to overclock the CPU using the included software
Only includes 8GB of RAM, but it’s easily upgradeable for more memory
Full HD quality display screen measures 15.6” diagonally
cons: Could use a larger hard drive than the 256GB SSD drive that’s included

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop But Read Carefully
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues with the laptop. In the process of downloading all my games and apps i realized this model does not come with an HDD drive and only the 256GB SSD. Just head up before you buy
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Blackall

customer_reviews.title: A very solid performance notebook.
customer_reviews.text: Opening up the back cover was easy. Upgraded DRAM and SSHD. Installing the SSHD was a bit tricky due to very tight space. Experienced slow speeds on both WiFi and wired Ethernet in the beginning. Did a bit of research and found out Omen Command Center has a Network Booster setting that seems to throttle network traffics. After changing the Network Booster setting to Custom and set web browsers priority to High, I now got consistent maximum speeds from Speedtest.com and Fast.com from both WiFI and wired Ethernet. A bit confusing to start, but now this HP Omen is rocking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great specs for the price. I had bought a Helios 300 with similar specs that died in three days. This one has been much more reliable, and played most of my games on high/maxed out settings with a consistent 60fps. The Division 2 on Ultra looks and plays great. Great benchmarks on Assassin’s Creed Origins as well. Still poking through a bunch of new games but it’s been consistently rocking it. Dropped in a 2.5 inch SSD and 16GB of RAM tonight and getting to the internals was hassle-free. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hajek

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Amazon product description
customer_reviews.text: Inaccurate website description. Stated that there is one 8gb ram in one slot, but it's on both slots, leaving no room for upgrade. When I open up for Ram upgrade , surprise, there is a two 4gb ram + 4gb ram on both slots no room for upgrade. I was planing to get 16gb upgrade but I got 12 Gb ram, 4Gb original + 8Gb purchased separately (4gb in garbage). BTW there is a room for 2.5" HDD besides 256gb ssd, flex cable and hdd brackets are included. Why didn't mention that ? Nvidia G-sync is it crossed over, why? When it's absolutely compatible, just need a mini display port. Kind regards, Not satisfied Amazon customer
customer_reviews.author: Alexandru Lupan

customer_reviews.title: Too Gaming and Affordable
customer_reviews.text: This laptop looks amazing. The red and black really goes well with the form. I did also install a 1tb ssd ti add more content and it was pretty easy. The games run really well. The only part is that it does have a loud fan but It doesn’t bother me. It also gets hot but it can handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Maracullis

customer_reviews.title: Just recently received it.
customer_reviews.text: So far I am enjoying it. Now that my son set the brightness up for me!! It works much faster than my previous laptop. Hoping for a long time of enjoyment from it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and excelent Battery life
customer_reviews.text: I got what I paid for. I installed an HDD and now is a full gaming laptop. The battery life has really surprised me. It's been a month and I had no issues with this laptop. I also thought that the laptop would get very warm but it turned out that the cooling system is *very* effective. The only issue I have encountered is that is really hard to open the case if you don't have the necessary tools at home.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Great gaming laptop
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laptop I had return it do to internet connectivity problems I guess there was some problems with some of the HP laptops and quite frankly I didn't have time to mess with it so I just returned it but overall the time I had with it it was a great budget-friendly gaming rig I would definitely buy one again just at time I needed laptop with no problems usually is something I work through but at the time I was sending to my son overseas in navy and he needed something that I had set up for him with no problems but omen rigs are built well and usually not that big of problem
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Jones

customer_reviews.title: Very good product at best price.
customer_reviews.text: Had doubt while placing order of refurbished product but received unused product without original packing. Working like charm & contain warranty as well. Performance, look, price in all aspect it's best in class. Completely satisfied, highly recommended to anyone looking for best performance in cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Manish Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Big Mistake
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with performace. Not the best hp I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: PRESTON BRADBERRY

customer_reviews.title: Costomer Servis no responding
customer_reviews.text: The laptop coming but not working ; I didn’t get replacement time yet ? Please Amazon help me?
customer_reviews.author: HERCULES

customer_reviews.title: good laptop
customer_reviews.text: all-round performance is good, but the sound is horrible . i got a bluetooth speaker system to have a better sound
customer_reviews.author: Prasad G.

customer_reviews.title: Great performance/price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this laptop. I was also happy with the performance while playing games. Possible to make easy RAM & SSD upgrades as you wish.
customer_reviews.author: Onur Orhan

customer_reviews.title: Less spaces
customer_reviews.text: All is good weight and hard disk may be issue.
customer_reviews.author: saroj neupane

product_meta.title: Omen by HP 2019 15-Inch Gaming Laptop, Intel i7-9750H Processor, NVIDIA GTX 1660Ti (6 GB), 8 GB RAM, 256 GB SSD, VR Ready, Windows 10 Home (15-dc1020nr, Black)
product_meta.description:
Style:i7 | 8GB | 256GB | GTX 1660TiYou've got places to go, plays to make, and power to proclaim. With the OMEN 15 Laptop, you can play at your best from anywhere—without sacrificing performance. Keep moving and improving your skills on a compact, portable rig designed to deliver desktop-class graphics performance, total immersion, and easy upgradability.

The OMEN 15 Laptop is geared for easy upgrades and maintenance with single panel access to 256 GB PCLE(R) NVMe(TM) Solid State Drive, and 8 GB of RAM. Plus, take advantage of a generous port selection for your favorite accessories and external displays.

- By producing authentic, spatially accurate 3D sound through any headphones or earbuds, this technology gives games, movies, and music a level of depth and immersion for the best entertainment experience possible. 
- Quickly access your PC’s internals with the large, single panel on the bottom of the laptop. Held on by only a few screws, it’s easily removable for upgrading or maintenance.
- It’s never been easier to give your device a bigger or second display. With HDMI output you can transmit HD video and sound with just one standard cable. Get all the benefits of the robust DisplayPort on your most portable devices. Transmit audio and up to 4K video in stunning quality.
- Now you can easily play PC games on your big screen TV with OMEN Game Stream—a free remote gaming service that lets you stream from your OMEN PC to other Windows 10 PCs.
- Breakthrough graphics performance powered by the ultra-speedy GDDR5 technology, allowing you to stream and game smoothly with NVIDIA GeForce Experience and GameReady.
- Get lost in an immersive narrow bezel FHD display with breathtaking resolution. A 2-zone dragon red backlit keyboard with 26-key rollover is strategically designed to accelerate your gaming reflexes.
feature_bullets: Realistic graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti (6 GB GDDR5 dedicated). enjoy new levels of gaming realism and performance with real-time ray-tracing technologies. Vr Ready. 15.6-Inch diagonal FHD IPS Anti-Glare micro-edge WLED-backlit Display (1920 x 1080)
Omen command center: easily turn up your performance with included software that enables control over your CPU overclocking settings and prioritizes your gaming traffic to minimize latency
Cutting-edge gaming performance: play The latest games, including Fortnight, PUBG, and Overwatch, from anywhere—without sacrificing performance
Super Fast Processor: 9th Generation intel(r) core(tm) i7-9750h Processor, 6-Core, 2.6GHz up to 4.5GHz for superior gaming performance
Memory: 8 GB DDR4-2666 SDRAM (upgradable with 2 accessible Memory Slots). Power supply type : 200 W AC power adapter
Hard Drive and storage: 256 GB pcie(r) nvme(tm) M.2 Solid State Drive

Ports: headphone/Microphone combo, Microphone jack, 2 USB 3.1 Gen 1 (side), 1 RJ-45 (rear), 1 USB 3.1 Gen 1 (rear), 1 HDMI 2.0 (rear), 1 Mini displayport(tm) (rear), 1 USB 3.1 Type-C(tm) (rear), 1 media card Reader
Battery life: up to 6 hours and 15 minutes (mixed usage); up to 4 hours and 30 minutes (video playback); up to 3 hours and 45 minutes (wireless streaming)
Dimensions AND weight (unpackaged): 14.17 inches (W) x 10.35 inches (D) x 0.98 inch (H); 5.31 pounds
Operating System and Warranty: Windows 10 Home and 1-Year Limited hardware warranty with 24-hour, 7 days a week Web support
